Class SQLEntityStore

java.lang.Object

      com.continuuity.loom.store.SQLEntityStore
All Implemented Interfaces:
EntityStore
public class SQLEntityStore
extends BaseEntityStore

Implementation of BaseEntityStore using a sql database as the persistent store.
